attributes.name: APARTMENT - Cityside - Serviced Apartment for Sale at The Aurora Suites and Pavilion in Olongapo City
attributes.project_name: The Aurora Suites and Pavilion - Serviced Apartment

description.text: The Newest Lifestyle Landmark of Subic Bay’s Central Business District The Aurora Suites and Pavilion is the flagship development of Aurora Subic Leisure Inc. featuring a 10-storey hotel suites and serviced apartments building with spectacular views of Subic Bay complemented by a curated commercial and office pavilion for retail, dining, and leisure spaces as well as for business process office and institutional locators. With Subic Bay Freeport Zone positioned as a key ecotourism and industrial destination in Central Luzon, the masterfully designed The Aurora Suites provides the utmost residential convenience with its studio and loft-type serviced apartment units (with semi-furnished and fully-furnished ready for occupancy options) to meet lifestyle and business needs.  Enjoy special offers and promotions for the grand opening of The Aurora Suites and Pavilion this 2022. ● Number and size of bedrooms – studio apartment open layout - 41.70 sq.m. ● Number of bathrooms - 1 bathroom ● Parking arrangements – parking spaces on a first-come, first-served basis ● Furnishing – Semi-furnished ● Location – near Harbor Point Ayala Mall (650 m), Allied Care Experts (ACE) Medical Center - Baypointe hospital (900 m), SBMA Boardwalk (400 m), Brent International School (6.5 km) ● For turnover in 2022  The Aurora Serviced Apartments Labitan St. cor. Canal Road and Dewey Avenue, CBD Subic Bay Freeport Zone, Olongapo City Terms and Conditions Leasehold rights are for forty (40) years  MAIN INTERIOR DOORS &amp; JAMBS Door lock mechanism in card key system Solid Swing Type Tanguile wood panel door jambs in varnish finish  HOTEL AMENITIES Service Apartment Owners may avail and enjoy the following facilities and services: RECREATION &amp; ENTERTAINMENT FACILITIES Spa Services Fitness Center Swimming Pool DINING FACILITIES Café and Restaurant with Private Dining Area Pool Deck Bar BUSINESS &amp; SOCIAL EVENTS FACILITIES Business Center Conference and Meeting Rooms Grand Ballroom GUEST SERVICES Reception and Concierge Services Housekeeping and Laundry Services PWD Access Guest and Service Elevator 24 Hour Security and CCTV Standby Generator  Year Built: 2022 Turnover Date: September 2022
